root.name: Sangokushi Taisen
root.description: Sangokushi Taisen, developed and published by Sega, is a card-based real-time strategy game for arcades. It is set in a fantasy version of the Three Kingdoms time period in China, and has players move around real cards on a board to manipulate corresponding in-game units.The game has been ported to the Nintendo DS twice: the 2.0 version as Sangokushi Taisen DS, and the 3.0 verison as Sangokushi Taisen Ten.
